transcript:
Customer: Hello, hello?
Executive: Haan ji. Deepak sir namaskar, Deepak sir namaskar.
Customer: Namaste ji boliye.
Executive: Haan, maine bola tha sir last call pe ke ye jo aapka catalog hai, isme jo corrections the, maine bheja tha department mein to vo ho ke aa gaye hain sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To ab thoda sa, thoda sa na mere ko aur aapko milke thoda sa ispe kaam karna padega and lagbhag lagbhag 10 minute ka sir.
Customer: Abhi, abhi to hum da to drive kar raha hu.
Executive: Drive kar rahe ho?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha. To fir kitne baje free ho jaoge sir?
Customer: O, sham ko call back karta hu, pahunch ke jaldi pahunch gaya to call back kar lunga 5 baje tak.
Executive: Achcha achcha aapne iski video meeting ki request dali thi kya?
Customer: Kaunsi?
Executive: Video meeting ki request dali thi kya sir aapne?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, vo andar show kar raha tha, labour ka isliye vo puch raha tha.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha matlab galti se ho gaya tha hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Fir aaj time dena sir dhyan se hain na. Aaj karwa lo isko final.
Customer: Haan bol. Theek hai theek hai. Haan uska karwaiye na mujhe vo order ka, theek hai.
Executive: Haan bilkul sir bilkul.
Executive: Kal maine jitne bhi the sabki calling ki hai. Most probably ek ek product wale the.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Kal baith ke, kal maine sabka follow up liya. Jitne bhi purane the un un client ko bhi call kiya.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha. Kuch nikla sir interesting sir?
Customer: Industrial nahi vo sab dekhe to vo home house wife ki cheeze thi.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Jyada se jyada.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Phone karu phone karu.
Executive: Kuch nikla ya nahi sir kal call kiya tha to?
Customer: Nahi nahi kuch nahi sab khali pade hue hain. Ek UP se banda mila tha vo bole ke karwa do transport. Pehle payment kar to fir transport kara do usko to kya kare.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha.
Executive: To bol do sir ke main video bana ke bhej raha hu tumhe maal maal ko load kara ke hum payment bhejo yaha se.
Customer: Are bhai sahab. Are UP walo ka jab tak paisa nahi aayega tab tak kya maal hoga. Nahi sir bharose wali baat to koi bharosa mat karna sir jab tak payment na aa jaye tab tak.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Chalo theek hai mister phone kar lena ek baar sham ko hain na.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Theek hai Deepak sir.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help with catalog corrections.

- Customer was asked for video meeting request.

- Customer wants order to be processed.

- Customer shares negative experience with UP transport.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed catalog corrections are done.

- Executive clarified video meeting request was a mistake.

- Executive assured order will be processed.

- Executive advised caution with UP transport without payment.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in the evening.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, corrections, video meeting, transport, payment
